0: RESOLUTION OF BOTH HOUSES INFORMING PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE THAT THE SENATE AND THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES HAVE CONVENED IN A JOINT SESSION TO CONSIDER THE REQUEST OF THE PRESIDENT FOR THE FURTHER EXTENSION OF THE PROCLAMATION OF MARTIAL LAW AND THE SUSPENSION OF THE PRIVILEGE OF WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS IN THE WHOLE OF MINDANAO FOR A PERIOD OF ONE (1) YEAR, FROM JANUARY 1, 2018 TO DECEMBER 31, 2018, OR FOR SUCH OTHER PERIOD OF TIME AS THE CONGRESS  MAY DETERMINE AND, THERE BEING A QUORUM, HAVE ENTERED UPON THE EXERCISE OF THEIR FUNCTIONS
